post.subject: Light Cone Event Warp: "Brilliant Fixation," "Bygone Reminiscence"
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/08/19/36dc25a7f57ffd9398d8993806cb334d_7307354928778964075.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"337918"}},{"insert":"
Hello, Trailblazers!
Light Cone Event Warp Period for this phase is 2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time), and includes the following content:

▌Light Cone Event Warp: "Brilliant Fixation""},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Those Many Springs (Nihility)" and 4-star Light Cones "Poised to Bloom (Harmony)," "Eyes of the Prey (Nihility)," and "A Secret Vow (Destruction)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cones
Those Many Springs (Nihility)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones
Poised to Bloom (Harmony)
Eyes of the Prey (Nihility)
A Secret Vow (Destruction)

▌Light Cone Event Warp: "Bygone Reminiscence""},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Earthly Escapade (Harmony)" and 4-star Light Cones "Poised to Bloom (Harmony)," "Eyes of the Prey (Nihility)," and "A Secret Vow (Destruction)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
2024/08/21 12:00:00 – 2024/09/09 15:00:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cones
Earthly Escapade (Harmony)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones
Poised to Bloom (Harmony)
Eyes of the Prey (Nihility)
A Secret Vow (Destruction)

※ Among the above Light Cones, the limited Light Cone will not become available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star Light Cone "Those Many Springs (Nihility)" can only be obtained from the Light Cone Event Warp Brilliant Fixation, while the limited 5-star Light Cone "Earthly Escapade (Harmony)" can only be obtained from the Light Cone Event Warp Bygone Reminiscence.
※ The 4-star Light Cone "Poised to Bloom (Harmony)" will become available in Stellar Warp in Version 2.5, but will not be available in Departure Warp.
※ This event is considered a Light Cone Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star Light Cone in any Light Cone Event Warp will always be carried over to other Light Cone Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.
"}]
